name: response
description: An entity that describes a time interval in the context of an experimental task.

is_active.description: Active response is true if generates events that change task params, false if is just recording something, might be connected to a device

activity_threshold.description: Defines what is considered a response in the context of a given task

activity_units.description: Units of the activity values in Standard International format.

device_list.description: list of device types that are required to run this stimuli / response / feedback / delays
